item.title: Peekaboo Slot Canyon UTV and Hiking Adventure
item.description: Peekaboo Slot Canyon is one of southern Utah's most incredible pathways through the area's famous red rock. We'll drive you there on a thrilling ATV ride starting in a private canyon. Soon you'll be marveling at the stunning landscape of the Grand Staircase and walking through the beauty of a narrow red rock canyon with 100 ft tall walls. Whatever your age, this is an awe-inspiring experience.

image.alt: Peekaboo Slot Canyon UTV and Hiking Adventure

item.title: Award Winning UTV Slot Canyon Tour
item.description: Explore the slot canyons of East Zion and ride to and from the canyons in a Can Am UTV during this adventure tour. Our guides drive you in the UTV, so you can sit back and enjoy this exciting off-road experience. Traverse rough terrain to reach the canyons then wander around on foot to explore the deepest parts of these remote areas. Be sure to bring a camera for frame-worthy photos.

image.alt: Award Winning UTV Slot Canyon Tour

item.title: East Zion Crimson Canyon Hike & UTV Adventure
item.description: Experience the beauty of Slot Canyons without the crowds on this small-group tour near Zion National Park. In an off-road UTV vehicle, you'll journey into the rugged backcountry, and to a private access area few visitors reach. Led by an experienced guide, hike into the slot canyon and conquer climbing obstacles reaching 10 feet high, while admiring the towering sandstone walls.

image.alt: East Zion Crimson Canyon Hike & UTV Adventure

item.title: Peek-A-Boo Slot Canyon Tour UTV Adventure (Private)
item.description: Journey into Slot Canyon in a UTV that can tackle the sandy trails. This private tour takes you to an off-the-beaten-path location far from the crowds of Zion's most-visited areas. Upon arrival, you'll take a short hike into the canyon where your guide will tell you all about its geology and history. Afterward, there's time for some optional sandboarding fun.

image.alt: Peek-A-Boo Slot Canyon Tour UTV Adventure (Private)

item.title: East Zion 4 Hour Slot Canyon Canyoneering UTV Tour
item.description: Adventure-loving travelers will enjoy the opportunity to hike, canyoneer, rappel, and travel in a UTV through some of the most amazing slot canyons in the East Zion area. Be immersed in the incredible landscapes of this national park while having fun and enjoying the views. Receive personalized guidance on a small-group tour with a maximum of ten participants.

image.alt: East Zion 4 Hour Slot Canyon Canyoneering UTV Tour

item.title: Guided Hike through Peek-a-Boo Slot Canyon (Small Group)
item.description: Embark on an adventure off the beaten path in Zion National Park. This small-group guided hiking tour takes you to the Peek-A-Boo Slot Canyon, a serene spot of distinctive Navajo Sandstone rocks that have taken millions of years to form. Your guide will tell you all about the area's history and geology as you explore.

image.alt: Guided Hike through Peek-a-Boo Slot Canyon (Small Group)

item.title: East Zion Canyoneering: Elkheart Canyon & UTV Tour
item.description: Experience the adventurous side of Utah during a small-group tour that includes rappelling into a slot canyon. Begin the half-day tour with an off-road drive through the mountains, then go for a hike along the red rocks to reach the canyon. Rappel down the canyon walls and explore this unique rock formation at your leisure. Feel safe with a certified guide leading the way.

image.alt: East Zion Canyoneering: Elkheart Canyon & UTV Tour

item.title: Great Chamber/Peekaboo Slot Canyon UTV Tour 4hrs
item.description: Get more out of your visit to the Zion National Park on this small-group guided tour to incredible Slot Canyon. Meet your guide at the trailhead and hop on board an off-road vehicle. Take a half-mile walk through the amazing canyon. Visit a hidden lake in a cave and then hike a bit more to the Great Chamber. Enjoy some exercise while enjoying the impressive landscape views.

image.alt: Great Chamber/Peekaboo Slot Canyon UTV Tour 4hrs

item.title: YOU DRIVE!! Guided 4 Hr Peek-a-Boo Slot Canyon ATV Tour
item.description: Explore backcountry sand trails and climb over rugged terrain during a small-group ATV adventure in Kanab, Utah. Set out on a half-day tour in two- or four-person ATVs that travels from Kanab up to Hog Canyon. Drive to the Peek-a-Boo slot canyon and learn about the area’s dramatic rock formations. Checking out sweeping views during the adrenaline-pumping drive.

image.alt: YOU DRIVE!! Guided 4 Hr Peek-a-Boo Slot Canyon ATV Tour

item.title: Zion Sunset Jeep Tour
item.description: Experience the beauty of East Zion in Utah at sunset with an adventurous small-group tour. Begin with an exciting Jeep ride up the mountain to one of the highest points in East Zion. After the adrenaline-pumping Jeep ride, slow down and watch the sunset over the cliffs of Zion National Park. Chairs, blankets, and snacks are all provided for taking in the views.

image.alt: Zion Sunset Jeep Tour

item.title: East Zion 2 Hour Slot Canyon Canyoneering UTV Tour
item.description: Discover Utah’s dramatic slot canyons and caverns—and enjoy an active way to explore—on this small-group, family-friendly excursion. Set off in the afternoon, and head to Peekaboo Slot Canyon, where you can practice canyoneering and rappelling skills and admire the striking landscape. Finish the tour with a stop at Belly of the Dragon Cave before returning to your departure point.

image.alt: East Zion 2 Hour Slot Canyon Canyoneering UTV Tour

item.title: UTV Dune Cruise and Surf at Coral Pink Sand Dunes
item.description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of Coral Pink Sand Dunes State Park to the fullest! Glide effortlessly through the majestic dunes on UTVs Pause for a moment to catch sight of the legendary "Sandsquatch" Bigfoot and explore the Coral Pink Slot Canyons affectionately known as "Big Foots Hideout". Then zip over to the iconic Star Dune, one of the largest in the park for a fun and adrenaline pumping Sand boarding adventure. Guests can either stand or sit on the sleds. Great for most ages and abilities.

image.alt: UTV Dune Cruise and Surf at Coral Pink Sand Dunes

item.title: Small-Group East Zion White Mountain Horseback Ride
item.description:
This tour combines two of Southern Utah's most popular activities: exploring scenic slot canyons and horseback riding. You will not find any tour in Southern Utah that allows visitors to experience both of these exciting activities at the same time!
Zion National Park is famous for it's beautiful Slot Canyons. Photographers and travelers are constantly on the search for these incredible land formations. This backcountry canyon is free from the crowds of Zion, but offers the same beauty. And guests get to experience on horseback!

image.alt: Small-Group East Zion White Mountain Horseback Ride

item.title: Peekaboo Slot Canyon 4WD Tour
item.description: See one of the region’s most beautiful slot canyons without the crowds that overtake the more famous Antelope Canyon. Instead, an experienced guide will drive you in a four-wheel-drive vehicle (the only way to reach the site besides hiking) to Peekaboo Slot Canyon where you’ll learn the geology and history and have time to take dramatic photos. Other nearby stops like Anasazi Moqui Steps may be included if there’s extra time.

image.alt: Peekaboo Slot Canyon 4WD Tour

item.title: Via Ferrata / Rappel Adventure in East Zion
item.description: This tour may be just 2.5 hours long, but the thrills will last your whole trip. To begin, you’ll hop into an ATV for a scenic ride—look for markings from early settlers. Then you’ll get geared up to conquer the Via Ferrata, an iron path up Cave Lakes Canyon. Before you rappel 180 feet back down to reality, the staff will toss you a cold one to celebrate!

image.alt: Via Ferrata / Rappel Adventure in East Zion

item.title: East Zion East Rim Jeep Tour
item.description: Zion’s iconic landscapes rise from the banks of the Virgin River into pineclad canyons and rocky “fins” jutting out of the earth, and hiking on foot is only one way to see them. Hop on this one-hour Jeep tour, and you’ll catch sights like Checkerboard Mesa and Jolley Gulch from their best vantage points: above them. No experience required—just a willingness to hold on tight.

image.alt: East Zion East Rim Jeep Tour

item.title: East Zion Checkerboard Evening Shadow Horseback Ride
item.description: Saddle up and soak up the views of Zion National Park from the back of a horse. This small-group trail ride will have you riding into the sunset, far away from Zion's crowds. You'll ride to a spectacular viewpoint where you will watch the sky turn orange and red above the Cliffs of Zion.

image.alt: East Zion Checkerboard Evening Shadow Horseback Ride

item.title: Slot Canyon Tour & Sandboarding UTV Adventure
item.description: Adventure-seeking travelers will love sandboarding down dunes near the entrance to the beautiful Zion National Park. You'll get there on a fun UTV ride, driven by a guide so you don't have to worry about self-driving. Sit down or stand up on the dune boards, depending on your comfort level. Continue the UTV tour to Peekaboo Slot Canyon and admire the impressive views.

image.alt: Slot Canyon Tour & Sandboarding UTV Adventure

item.title: Campfire S'mores and Stars Tour in Kanab
item.description: Enjoy an evening around the campfire in a beautiful location. This tour takes you into a private canyon, which has been used often as a filming location. There, you'll meet a her od Texas longhorns, gather around the campfire, make s'mores with homemade marshmallows, and learn all about the star-studded night sky.

image.alt: Campfire S'mores and Stars Tour in Kanab

item.title: Sunset Sandboarding Peekaboo Slot Canyon UTV Adventure (Private)
item.description: If you’re looking for an outdoor adventure but want to avoid Zion National Park and the huge crowds that come with it, this Peekaboo Slot Canyon Sandboarding and UTV Sunset Adventure is the perfect solution. With your own private group, ride in an ATV up to Peekaboo Slot Canyon, and then sandboard on the dunes while the sun sets over the area.

image.alt: Sunset Sandboarding Peekaboo Slot Canyon UTV Adventure (Private)

item.title: Peek-a-boo Slot Canyon Tour and Sandboarding UTV Adventure
item.description: If you’d like to explore the dramatic landscapes of the Zion National Park but aren’t up for extreme sports, this family friendly sandboarding adventure at Peekaboo slot canyon is ideal. Don’t worry about driving off-road as your guide does all the driving on this tour. Ride a UTV and hike into the canyon, then grab your dune board for some active fun. You can sled down on the board if you prefer.

image.alt: Peek-a-boo Slot Canyon Tour and Sandboarding UTV Adventure

item.title: The Huntress Slot Canyon Adventure
item.description: Discover one of Utah's famed slot canyons on a canyoneering trip near East Zion. Join a small group and hike through the red rock landscapes until you reach 'The Huntress' canyon. Then, rappel down the colorful sandstone walls into the canyon to explore. This tour is great for beginners and doesn't require any previous canyoneering experience.

image.alt: The Huntress Slot Canyon Adventure

item.title: Private Peek-A-Boo slot canyon guided tours
item.description: Explore the otherworldly landscape of Zion National Park's Peek-A-Boo slot canyon on this private guided tour from Kanab. As well as walking inside the incredible slot canyon, you'll ride in a Jeep over pink coral sand dunes and see Native American moki steps, ancient pictographs, and fossilised coral from millions of years ago.

image.alt: Private Peek-A-Boo slot canyon guided tours

item.title: East Zion Pine Knoll Horseback Ride
item.description: Some trails winding up the side of Pine Knoll in Zion National Park ramble through desert forests with intense elevation gains—tricky for hikers but more than manageable on horseback. On this small-group tour, meet your horses, saddle up, and follow a horse trail to the summit of Pine Knoll. Catch scenic views of Zion, Southern Utah, and the Grand Canyon before making the return journey down the mountain.

image.alt: East Zion Pine Knoll Horseback Ride
